articles.title: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak rocked by resignation of top ally Raab over bullying allegations - CNN
articles.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak suffered a serious blow to his premiership on Friday as one of his closest allies resigned over allegations he bullied officials.

articles.title: Now WhatsApp can save 'disappearing' messages if the sender consents - The Verge
articles.description: WhatsApp is giving people an option to save messages they receive even if they’re supposed to disappear. If the recipient tries to save the message, the sender is notified, and can choose to allow or deny the request.
articles.content:

articles.author: Hannah Devlin
articles.title: Elephant seals sleep for just two hours a day, deep dive research reveals - The Guardian
articles.description: Marine mammals typically sleep in 10-minute bursts during deep, 30-minute dives to avoid predators, scientists believe
articles.content: Seals dozing on the beach may appear to be enjoying the ultimate life of leisure. However, groundbreaking research has revealed that for most of their lives elephant seals sleep just two hours daily … [+3744 chars]

articles.title: I was diagnosed with Parkinson's at 45. These were my 'shocking' first symptoms - Daily Mail
articles.description: Vikas Chinnan, from San Carlos, California, was diagnosed with young onset Parkinson's disease after suffering stiffness in his right side, apathy and a lack of interest in activities he once loved.
articles.content:
A Californian man who was diagnosed with Parkinson's in his 40s said he initially wrote off his earliest symptoms.
